overview: Beautiful but socially inept Laurel (Shay Laren) is too repressed to act on her need for sex with other women, so she spies on lesbian couples instead. Sitting alone in a lesbian bar, Laurel spies on couples hooking up - and then follows them home to watch them have sex. Whether it's older woman Kiki Daire meeting up with young internet crush Allie Haze, tempestuous Ash Hollywood fighting with lover Sovereign Syre, or beautiful French-Asian clones Katsuni and Sharon Lee, Shay's masturbatory sessions are fueled by images of the lesbian encounters she spies on. Starring Shay Laren, Allie Haze, Katsuni, Sharon Lee, Kiki Daire, Ash Hollywood and Sovereign Syre.
title: Lesbian Voyeur
